name: Fennmoor Forest
description:
Fennmoor Forest tells the story of a mage trying to return to her home in the woods by navigating through a forest that has become enchanted. The player assumes the role of this mage, guiding her through the levels and helping her get back home. Use arrow keys or A and D to move, spacebar to jump- hit jump repeatedly against a wall to wall jump. [Theme: "Enchant"]
